00032 winetricks::winetricks(QString prefixName, QWidget * parent, Qt::WFlags f) : QDialog(parent, f)
00033 {
00034     // Loading libq4wine-core.so
00035     libq4wine.setFileName("libq4wine-core");
00036 
00037     if (!libq4wine.load()){
00038         libq4wine.load();
00039     }
00040 
00041     // Getting corelib calss pointer
00042     CoreLibClassPointer = (CoreLibPrototype *) libq4wine.resolve("createCoreLib");
00043     CoreLib = (corelib *)CoreLibClassPointer(true);
00044 
00045     db_prefix = new Prefix();
00046 
00047     this->winetricks_bin.append(QDir::homePath());
00048     this->winetricks_bin.append("/.config/");
00049     this->winetricks_bin.append(APP_SHORT_NAME);
00050     this->winetricks_bin.append("/winetricks");
00051         
00052     qDebug()<<this->winetricks_bin;
00053 
00054     this->prefix_path = db_prefix->getPath(prefixName);
00055     this->console_bin = CoreLib->getSetting("console", "bin").toString();
00056     this->console_args = CoreLib->getSetting("console", "args", FALSE).toString();
00057 
00058     setupUi(this);
00059 
00060     connect (cmdInstall, SIGNAL (clicked()), this, SLOT(run_winetricks()));
00061     connect (cmdExit, SIGNAL (clicked()), this, SLOT(accept()));
00062     connect (cmdInstWinetricks, SIGNAL (clicked()), this, SLOT (install_winetricks()));
00063 
00064     parse();
00065     //fill list
00066     QString str;
00067     foreach (str, names) {
00068         lstMain->addItem(str);
00069     }
00070 }
00071 
00072 void winetricks::install_winetricks() {
00073     downloadwinetricks ();
00074 }
00075 
00076 void winetricks::run_winetricks(){
00077 
00078     if (!QFile(this->winetricks_bin).exists()){
00079         QMessageBox::warning(this, tr("Error"), tr("<p>q4wine can't locate winetricks at %1 path!</p><p>The script is maintained and hosted by DanKegel at http://www.kegel.com/wine/winetricks.  You can get it from the commandline with the command:</p><p>wget http://www.kegel.com/wine/winetricks</p><p>Or use \"Install winetricks\" button.</p>").arg(this->winetricks_bin));
00080         return;
00081     }
00082 
00083     QStringList args;
00084     if (!console_args.isEmpty()){
00085         // If we have any conslope parametres, we gona preccess them one by one
00086         QStringList cons_args = console_args.split(" ");
00087         for (int i=0; i<cons_args.count(); i++){
00088             if (!cons_args.at(i).isEmpty())
00089                 args.append(cons_args.at(i));
00090         }
00091     }
00092 
00093     args.append(CoreLib->getSetting("system", "sh").toString());
00094     args.append("-c");
00095 
00096     QString arg;
00097         if (!CoreLib->getSetting("network", "host", false).toString().isEmpty()){
00098             arg.append("http_proxy=\"http://");
00099             arg.append(CoreLib->getSetting("network", "host", false).toString());
00100             if (!CoreLib->getSetting("network", "port", false).toString().isEmpty()){
00101                 arg.append(":");
00102                 arg.append(CoreLib->getSetting("network", "port", false).toString());
00103             }
00104             arg.append("\" ftp_proxy=\"http://");
00105             arg.append(CoreLib->getSetting("network", "host", false).toString());
00106             if (!CoreLib->getSetting("network", "port", false).toString().isEmpty()){
00107                 arg.append(":");
00108                 arg.append(CoreLib->getSetting("network", "port", false).toString());
00109             }
00110             arg.append("\" ");
00111         }
00112 
00113         arg.append("WINEPREFIX=");
00114         arg.append(this->prefix_path);
00115         arg.append(" ");
00116         arg.append(this->winetricks_bin);
00117         arg.append(" ");
00118         arg.append(lstMain->currentItem()->text());
00119 
00120         qDebug()<<arg;
00121 
00122     args.append(arg);
00123 
00124     Process *exportProcess = new Process( args, console_bin, QDir::homePath(), tr("Running winetricks..."), tr("Plz wait..."));
00125 
00126     if (exportProcess->exec()==QDialog::Accepted){
00127         return;
00128     }
00129 
00130     return;
00131 }

00133 void winetricks::downloadwinetricks () {
00134         /*
00135          * Downloading winetriks and installing it
00136          */
00137 
00138     QStringList args;
00139     if (!console_args.isEmpty()){
00140         // If we have any conslope parametres, we gona preccess them one by one
00141         QStringList cons_args = console_args.split(" ");
00142         for (int i=0; i<cons_args.count(); i++){
00143             if (!cons_args.at(i).isEmpty())
00144                 args.append(cons_args.at(i));
00145         }
00146     }
00147 
00148     args.append(CoreLib->getSetting("system", "sh").toString());
00149     args.append("-c");
00150     QString arg;
00151 
00152         if (!CoreLib->getSetting("network", "host", false).toString().isEmpty()){
00153             arg.append("http_proxy=\"http://");
00154             arg.append(CoreLib->getSetting("network", "host", false).toString());
00155             if (!CoreLib->getSetting("network", "port", false).toString().isEmpty()){
00156                 arg.append(":");
00157                 arg.append(CoreLib->getSetting("network", "port", false).toString());
00158             }
00159             arg.append("\" ftp_proxy=\"http://");
00160             arg.append(CoreLib->getSetting("network", "host", false).toString());
00161             if (!CoreLib->getSetting("network", "port", false).toString().isEmpty()){
00162                 arg.append(":");
00163                 arg.append(CoreLib->getSetting("network", "port", false).toString());
00164             }
00165             arg.append("\" ");
00166         }
00167 
00168         arg.append(CoreLib->getWhichOut("wget"));
00169         arg.append(" http://kegel.com/wine/winetricks -O ");
00170         arg.append(this->winetricks_bin);
00171         arg.append(" && ");
00172         arg.append(CoreLib->getWhichOut("chmod"));
00173         arg.append(" +x ");
00174         arg.append(this->winetricks_bin);
00175 
00176     args.append(arg);
00177 
00178     Process *exportProcess = new Process( args, console_bin, QDir::homePath(), tr("Downloading and installing winetricks..."), tr("Plz wait..."));
00179 
00180         exportProcess->exec();
00181         // setting help
00182 
00183 
00184 
00185 }

00203 void winetricks::addToList(QString arg) {
00204 QStringList args = arg.split(" ");
00205 QString name = args.at(0);
00206 int pos = arg.count() - name.count();
00207 QString desc = arg.right(pos);
00208 names.append(name);
00209 descs.append(desc);
00210 
00211 }
00212 void winetricks::parse() {
00213     //create a Winetricks process
00214       QProcess *p = new QProcess (this);
00215     QString pargs;
00216     pargs.append(winetricks_bin);
00217     pargs.append(" --kegelfuck");
00218 
00219    p->start(pargs);
00220 
00221    p->waitForFinished();
00222      //get output
00223    QString lang;
00224    // Getting env LANG variable
00225    lang = getenv("LANG");
00226   lang = lang.split(".").at(1);
00227  if (lang.isNull())
00228   lang = "UTF8";
00229  /* Fucking code because Kegel is MORON! */
00230   QTextCodec *codec = QTextCodec::codecForName(lang.toAscii());
00231   QString wOut = codec->toUnicode(p->readAllStandardOutput());
00232     delete p;
00233 
00234     //parse now
00235 bool isNowParse = false;
00236 QStringList strs = wOut.split("\n");
00237 QString str;
00238 
00239 foreach (str, strs){
00240     str = str.trimmed();
00241 
00242   if (str == "Apps:" || str == "Pseudopackages:"){continue;}
00243   if (str == "Packages:") {isNowParse = true;
00244   continue;
00245   }
00246   if (isNowParse) {addToList(str);}
00247 
00248 
00249 }
00250 
00251 
00252 }

00256 
00257 void winetricks::on_lstMain_itemClicked(QListWidgetItem* item)
00258 {
00259     int i;
00260   for (i=0; i < descs.count() -1; ++i) {
00261    if (names.at(i) ==  item->text()){
00262        label->setText (descs.at(i));
00263    }
00264   }
00265 }
